/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc  -gencode arch=compute_70,code=sm_70 --generate-code=arch=compute_70,code=sm_70 -Xnvlink=--suppress-stack-size-warning -g -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/UnitTests_vtkm_source_testing.dir/UnitTests_vtkm_source_testing.cxx.o CMakeFiles/UnitTests_vtkm_source_testing.dir/UnitTestTangleSource.cxx.o CMakeFiles/UnitTests_vtkm_source_testing.dir/UnitTestWaveletSource.cxx.o -o CMakeFiles/UnitTests_vtkm_source_testing.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  ../../../lib/libvtkm_cont-1.5.a ../../../lib/libvtkm_source-1.5.a ../../../lib/libvtkmdiympi_nompi.a  -ldl -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread
